briefdescription.para: The main game loop of the application.
The state machine for the combat mode.

detaileddescription.para: The state machine of the combat mode.

briefdescription.para: Handles the stats mode state of the game.

detaileddescription.para: The state machine for the stats mode.
This function manages the interactions and transitions that occur within the stats mode, including displaying player stats and managing skill points.

briefdescription.para: Load the a game from the database.

parameterdescription.para: The id of the game state to be loaded.
A setter for the player position.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, 1 if the player could not be propperly reset, 2 if game state could not be loaded, 3 if player is NULL

detaileddescription.para: This function initializes and runs the main game loop, handling the various game states and transitions until the game is exited.

briefdescription.para: Handles the main menu state of the game.

detaileddescription.para: This function manages the interactions and transitions that occur within the main menu, including starting a new game, loading a game, and changing settings.

briefdescription.para: Handles the map mode state of the game.

detaileddescription.para: This function manages the interactions and transitions that occur within the map mode, including player movement, map exploration, and interactions with map elements.

briefdescription.para: Handles the loot mode state of the game.

detaileddescription.para: This function manages the interactions and transitions that occur when the player is looting after a combat encounter, including selecting items to take and managing inventory.

briefdescription.para: Handles the inventory mode state of the game.

detaileddescription.para: This function manages the interactions and transitions that occur within the inventory mode, including item management, usage, and equipping items.

briefdescription.para: Implements the main game loop and state handling for DungeonCrawl.
